verses.verse: When I would <S%H7495>heal<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, then is the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H1540>uncovered<s%>, and the <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>; for they <S%H6466>commit<s%> <S%H8267>falsehood<s%>, and the <S%H1590>thief<s%> entereth <S%H935>in<s%>, and the <S%H1416>troop<s%> of robbers <S%H6584>ravageth<s%> <S%H2351>without<s%>.

And they <S%H559>consider<s%> not in their <S%H3824>hearts<s%> that I <S%H2142>remember<s%> all their <S%H7451>wickedness<s%>: now have their own <S%H4611>doings<s%> beset them <S%H5437>about<s%>; they are before my <S%H6440>face<s%>.
They make the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8055>glad<s%> with their <S%H7451>wickedness<s%>, and the <S%H8269>princes<s%> with their <S%H3585>lies<s%>.

They are all <S%H5003>adulterers<s%>; they are as an <S%H8574>oven<s%> <S%H1197>heated<s%> by the <S%H644>baker<s%>; he <S%H7673>ceaseth<s%> to <S%H5782>stir<s%> the <S%H3888>fire<s%>, from the kneading of the <S%H1217>dough<s%>, until it be <S%H2556>leavened<s%>.

On the <S%H3117>day<s%> of our <S%H4428>king<s%> the <S%H8269>princes<s%> made themselves <S%H2470>sick<s%> with the <S%H2534>heat<s%> of <S%H3196>wine<s%>; he stretched <S%H4900>out<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> with <S%H3945>scoffers<s%>.

For they have made <S%H7126>ready<s%> their <S%H3820>heart<s%> like an <S%H8574>oven<s%>, while they lie in <S%H693>wait<s%>: their <S%H644>baker<s%> <S%H3463>sleepeth<s%> all the <S%H3915>night<s%>; in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> it <S%H1197>burneth<s%> as a <S%H3852>flaming<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%>.

They are all <S%H2552>hot<s%> as an <S%H8574>oven<s%>, and <S%H398>devour<s%> their <S%H8199>judges<s%>; all their <S%H4428>kings<s%> are <S%H5307>fallen<s%>: there is none among them that calleth unto <S%H7121>me<s%>.
Ephraim <S%H669><s%>, he <S%H1101>mixeth<s%> himself among the <S%H5971>peoples<s%>; <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> is a <S%H5692>cake<s%> not <S%H2015>turned<s%>.

Strangers <S%H2114><s%> have <S%H398>devoured<s%> his <S%H3581>strength<s%>, and he <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> it <S%H7872>not<s%>: yea, gray hairs are here and <S%H2236>there<s%> upon <S%H3045>him<s%>, and he knoweth it not.

And the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> doth <S%H6030>testify<s%> to his <S%H6440>face<s%>: yet they have not <S%H7725>returned<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%>, nor sought <S%H1245>him<s%>, for all this.

And <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> is like a <S%H6601>silly<s%> <S%H3123>dove<s%>, without <S%H3820>understanding<s%>: they <S%H7121>call<s%> unto <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, they <S%H1980>go<s%> to <S%H804>Assyria<s%>.

When they shall <S%H3212>go<s%>, I will <S%H6566>spread<s%> my <S%H7568>net<s%> upon <S%H3381>them<s%>; I will bring them down as the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>; I will <S%H3256>chastise<s%> <S%H5712>them<s%>, as their congregation hath <S%H8088>heard<s%>.

Woe <S%H188><s%> unto <S%H5074>them<s%>! for they have wandered from <S%H7701>me<s%>; destruction unto <S%H6586>them<s%>! for they have trespassed against <S%H6299>me<s%>: though I would redeem <S%H1696>them<s%>, yet they have spoken lies against <S%H3577>me<s%>.

And they have not <S%H2199>cried<s%> unto me with their <S%H3820>heart<s%>, but they <S%H3213>howl<s%> upon their <S%H4904>beds<s%>: they <S%H1481>assemble<s%> themselves for <S%H1715>grain<s%> and new <S%H8492>wine<s%>; they rebel against <S%H5493>me<s%>.
Though I have <S%H3256>taught<s%> and <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> their <S%H2220>arms<s%>, yet do they <S%H2803>devise<s%> mischief against <S%H7451>me<s%>.

They <S%H7725>return<s%>, but not to him that is on <S%H5920>high<s%>; they are like a <S%H7423>deceitful<s%> <S%H7198>bow<s%>; their <S%H8269>princes<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%> for the <S%H2195>rage<s%> of their <S%H3956>tongue<s%>: <S%H2097>this<s%> shall be their <S%H3933>derision<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.
